name: Space Junk (itch) (epord)
description:
Space Junk

After a life of exploring the outer rim you decide travelling back to your home galaxy. The only mean available was an intergalactical spaceship with severe malfunctions, the ultimate space junk. Little did you know that what looked like a routine trip, even with your skills, was doomed to spiral out of control.

Controls

  A: turn left
  D: turn right
  W: activate turbo
  Mouse click: shoot

Credits:
